values.name: Lung-RADS 0: incomplete, locating priors
values.description: Lung-RADS 0: Incomplete. Prior chest CT examination being located for comparison.

values.name: Lung-RADS 0: incomplete, cannot evaluate
values.description: Lung-RADS 0: Incomplete. Part or all of lungs cannot be evaluated

values.name: Lung-RADS 0: incomplete, inflammatory or infectious process
values.description: Lung-RADS 0: Incomplete. Findings suggestive of an inflammatory or infectious process

values.name: Lung-RADS 1: negative for lung nodules
values.description: No lung nodules are found

values.name: Lung-RADS 1: negative, nodule is benign
values.description: Benign nodules are found, complete, central, popcorn, concentric ring calcifications or fat-containing nodules

values.name: Lung-RADS 2: benign, juxtapleural nodule
values.description: nodule is less than 10 mm (524 mm3 ) mean diameter at baseline or new. It is solid; smooth margins; and oval, lentiform, or triangular shape.

values.name: Lung-RADS 2: benign, solid nodule
values.description: Nodule is less than 6 mm or 113 mm3  at baseline OR  new, less than  4 mm or 34 mm3

values.name: Lung-RADS 2: benign,  part solid nodule
values.description: less than 6 mm total mean diameter or 113 mm3 at baseline

values.name: Lung-RADS 2: benign, non-solid nodule
values.description: less than 30 mm or 14,137 mm3  at baseline, new, or growing OR greater of equals to 30 mm or 14,137 mm3 . Stable or slowly growing.

values.name: Lung-RADS 2: benign, airway nodule
values.description: subsegmental - at baseline, new, or stable

values.name: Lung-RADS 2: category 3 or 4B, benign, after diagnostic workup
values.description: Category 3 lesion that is stable or decreased in size at 6-month follow-up CT OR Category 4B lesion proven to be benign in etiology following appropriate diagnostic workup

values.name: Lung-RADS 3: probably benign, solid nodule
values.description: more of equal to 6 mm to less than 8 mm or more or equal to 113 to less than 268 mm3  at baseline OR  New 4 mm to less than 6 mm  or 34 to less than 113 mm3

values.name: Lung-RADS 3: probably benign, part solid nodule
values.description: more of equal to 6 mm total mean diameter more or equal to 113 mm3  with solid component less than 6 mm or less than 113 mm3  at baseline OR   New less than 6 mm total mean diameter or less than 113 mm3

values.name: Lung-RADS 3: probably benign, non-solid nodule
values.description: more of equal to 30 mm or more or equal to 14,137 mm3 at baseline or new

values.name: Lung-RADS 3: probably benign, atypical pulmonary cyst
values.description: Growing cystic component (mean diameter) of a thick-walled cyst

values.name: Lung-RADS 3: category 4A, probably benign, after diagnostic workup
values.description: Category 4A lesion that is stable or decreased in size at 3-month follow-up CT (excluding airway nodules)

values.name: Lung-RADS 4A: suspicious, solid nodule
values.description: more or equal to 8 to less than 15 mm or more or equal to 268 to less than 1,767 mm3 at baseline OR  Growing less than 8 mm or less than 268 mm3 OR  New 6 to less than 8 mm 113 to less than 268 mm3

values.name: Lung-RADS 4A: suspicious, part solid nodule
values.description: more or equal to 6 mm total mean diameter or more or equal to 113 mm3  with solid component more or equal to 6 mm to less than 8 mm or more or equal to 113 to less than 268 mm3  at baseline OR  New or growing less than 4 mm or less than 34 mm3  solid component

values.name: Lung-RADS 4A: suspicious, airway nodule
values.description: Airway nodule, segmental or more proximal - at baseline

values.name: Lung-RADS 4A: suspicious, atypical pulmonary cyst
values.description: Thick-walled cyst OR Multilocular cyst at baseline OR Thin- or thick-walled cyst that becomes multilocular

values.name: Lung-RADS 4B: very suspicious, airway nodule
values.description: , segmental or more proximal - stable or growing

values.name: Lung-RADS 4B: very suspicious, solid nodule
values.description: more of equal to 15 mm or more or equal to 1767 mm3 at baseline OR  New or growing more of equal to 8 mm or more or equal to 268 mm3

values.name: Lung-RADS 4B: very suspicious, part solid nodule
values.description: Solid component more or equal to 8 mm more or equal to 268 mm3  at baseline OR  New or growing more or equal to 4 mm or more or equal to 34 mm?  solid component

values.name: Lung-RADS 4B: very suspicious, atypical pulmonary cyst
values.description: Thick-walled cyst with growing wall thickness or nodularity OR  Growing multilocular cyst (mean diameter) OR  Multilocular cyst with increased loculation or new or increased opacity (nodular, ground glass, or consolidation)

values.name: Lung-RADS 4B: very suspicious, slow growing solid or part solid nodule
values.description: Slow growing solid or part solid nodule e that demonstrates growth over multiple screening exams

values.name: Lung-RADS 4X: category 3 or 4, increased suspicion for lung cancer
values.description: Category 3 or 4 nodules with additional features or imaging findings that increase suspicion for lung cancer

attributes.name: Significant finding
attributes.description: A specific finding may add d to category 0-4 for clinically significant or potentially clinically significant findings unrelated to lung cancer
